entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is mentioned as being prominent among the people who seemed positively gleeful.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the people who knew about the freakish death of an obscure Department of Mysteries employee in St. Mungo’s.
